entities.description: Use of prescription pain relievers in any way a doctor did not direct.

Used OxyContin in the past 12 months in a way not directed by a doctor.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent ever used a pain reliever not directed by a doctor.
Indicates whether the respondent used OxyContin in the past 12 months not directed by a doctor.
Records the age when the respondent first used OxyContin in a way not directed by a doctor.
Records the year when the respondent first used OxyContin in a way not directed by a doctor.
